name: ai-design-components
description: Comprehensive UI/UX component design skills for AI-assisted development

plugins.name: ui-foundation-skills
plugins.description: Foundational design system including tokens and theming for consistent styling across all components

plugins.name: ui-data-skills
plugins.description: Data visualization, tables, and dashboard components for displaying and analyzing data (2/3 complete)

plugins.name: ui-input-skills
plugins.description: Form systems, search, and filter components for user input and data collection (1/2 complete)

plugins.name: ui-interaction-skills
plugins.description: Interactive components including AI chat interfaces, drag-drop functionality, and feedback systems (0/3 complete - WIP)

plugins.name: ui-structure-skills
plugins.description: Navigation, layout, and timeline components for app structure and organization (0/3 complete - WIP)

plugins.name: ui-content-skills
plugins.description: Media management and user onboarding components for content-rich experiences (0/2 complete - WIP)
